title: Opposite Notation
text: The notation -a is read as "the opposite of a." Therefore, in the problem, we are asked to find the opposite of -6.

title: Defining Opposite
text: The opposite of a number is the number that is the same distance from zero on the number line but on the opposite side of zero.

title: Answer
text: Which number is on the opposite side of 0, but is at the same distance from 0 as -6?
